DataElement.preferredName: Diastolic Blood Pressure Standing Evaluation Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the arterial pressure during the interval between heartbeats while maintaining an erect upright position.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the systematic, objective appraisal of the blood pressure after the contraction of the heart while the chambers of the heart refill with blood while maintaining an erect upright position.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The blood pressure after the contraction of the heart while the chambers of the heart refill with blood.

Concepts.definition: The minimum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during cardiac ventricular relaxation and filling.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position.:Evaluation; the act of placing value on something.

Concepts.definition: The act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the arterial pressure during the interval between heartbeats.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: Move to caBIG context as teh preferred Rep class for Measurement

ValueDomain.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Use caBIG Representation Term Measurement based on NCIt concept
